description: This isn't actually a single trip but a composite of many day hikes that myself and others have taken.  I took the GPS tracks from all of these hikes and put them together to represent most of the known trails on the south side of Mt Benson.  There may be a few other trails out there but I think this represents most of them.  If you know of others and have GPS tracks for them I'd love to get a copy of the gpx file and I'll add them to this summary.  Most of the trails in this summary are easy to moderate difficulty.  In Spring, Summer and Fall, the trails are great for hiking and mountain biking.  In winter there is some excellent snowshoeing to be had.  Note that although I listed the whole set of trails at 36km, you can hike much smaller portions of the trails.
directions: There are multiple access points.  You can get at these trails from the North or South end of Westwood lake, from Morrell sanctuary or from Nanaimo Lakes Road
title: Mt. Benson - South End
